value: LEVEL 24 600 BOURKE STREET, MELBOURNE, 3000, VIC, Australia

4911 - Electric Services Summary > SOUTH PACIFIC POWER PTY LIMITED is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover electric services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. SOUTH PACIFIC POWER PTY LIMITED is headquartered in Melbourne, Victoria. It is headed by director Peter Joseph Mccosker. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $39.34 million. Its net loss totalled $5.04 million. SOUTH PACIFIC POWER PTY LIMITED forms part of the transportation, communications, electric, gas, and sanitary services industry sector.
